text: This place is awesome! great tasting juice & the employees are always nice & knowledgeable.
I love this place! Freshest juice in town with knowledgeable and friendly service. It is a bit on the pricey side but that doesn't stop me from indulging.

Delicious! I keep coming back for the Bee Happy nut milk. Discovered this place after a friend bought me a 1 day juice cleanse for my bday! Bring your bottle and tote each time for $1 off for each! Thank you to this incredible staff too! Always a great welcome & take the time to make sure you sample these exotic flavors. Today, Brandon helped me and just his wonderful energy and customer service makes this place continue to be such a star! Thank you. I'll be back

The best place to get your juice for cleansing your body. The Raw cacao mocha iced coffee is the best ever!  We love how we feel and are addicted to this place definitely! Customer service is excellent and will keep coming back! Thank you!

They get one star for the juice , it's good. Unfortunately the customer service not professional . I ordered a 9$ taziki toast and while I stood right there I hear them talk about how they all don't like the taziki toast and said it was disgusting several times using the word disgusting to describe my food that I just ordered . It dosnt make the food or business look good at all . Employees need to watch what they say in front of guests . We have ears that hear every thing .

The juice can get pretty pricey, but I still frequent this place 2-3 times a week. The service is on point and the wonderful ladies here will always help you find just what you're looking for. I'm obsessed.

This is by far the best juice bar in town. The staff is always very friendly and helpful.
Have sampled many things there and my favorites are the Bee Royal in the juice line and the Bee Excellent in the nut milks. Yummy!!!!!!!!!!! 
A young man that works there named Adam was very, very helpful in my selections. And very knowledgeable on the products they carry. How they are made etc. This is my go to place.
Thank you Juice Standard for hiring very helpful and friendly staff.

This is the ONLY place here with ORGANIC COLD PRESSED JUICES and you can get ones that are juiced the day you go in. This is a great concept and real important if you don't want your juice that is heated in a traditional juicer which looses about half of its enzymes. I will support my local business person and pay what they want since they are providing a very good product. Its not cheap to be healthy. If you want to save lots of money then get a NORWALK JUICER for $2,500 and prep all your organic veggies and clean up yourself.

Just gotta say I love this place and all the workers. Every time i come in they remember me and what I got last time. Ashley and Adam are awesome. They're always outgoing, Adam told me about a yoga event that he would be at and convinced me to Check it out. First time doing yoga, it was hard but was an amazing experience doing yoga with headphones on while on grass. Never would have gone to something like that  if they didn't push me to try it out! Best shop ever!
The customer service is excellent.  They are always in a great mood!  It doesn't matter if it's the morning or night crew!  The Bee invincible starts my morning and keeps me going all afternoon!
Been here many times! The juice is out if this world. The nut milk rocks! The service is awesome... Wish I could drink this stuff daily...

I absolutely love their juice. The location is awesome!!!! I can't wait to start my 3 day!!! The Juice Standard sets the bar high anything other than them is sub standard!!!!   The juice queens, Jamie and Marcella are an absolute gem!!!! Love love love them!!!!

I knew nothing about juicing, but the staff changed that.  Very knowledgeable on all things juice and nut milks.  LOVED that you could sample.  I was pleasantly surprised by how much I enjoyed the juices.  And drinking out of a glass bottle was the BOMB.  I did the juice cleanse....highly recommend.   Not inexpensive, but totally worth it.  This is the Standard in Juice in my humble opinion!!!!!.

I've always about pressed juice.  I've heard about this place for a couple of years.  Daily freshness is key and thats what this company is all about.  And they open an hour later.  Never too late to do business.
Nice place to eat.defiantly recomend.I'll be back with friends soon. Good service friendly and prompt.

We regularly make our own juices at home but while on vaca it's hard to find a place that can offer the same or even better. We found this place and we really impressed with the amount of juices they offer as well as nut milks and coffee specialties. The staff was really friendly and let us have samples of their juices. The young gentleman also suggested we try a sample of their bee happy nut milk and we are so glad he did. It tasted just like chocolate milk. All the ingredients are organic which is really important when it comes to juicing.
All the juices are already made and come in glass bottles that resemble old milk jugs. They do charge a dollar per bottle that is refunded when you bring them back clean.  Now I'm sure some people might feel that considering the cost of the juices it should be included but I think it's a great incentive to bring back the bottles so they can reuse them and therefore cause less waste. It would be a shame to see all those bottles being thrown out.  We were able to return all but one which we rinsed and brought home with us to reuse. With all the bad food we eat on vaca it's nice to have a place that can offer some much needed nutrition. I just wish they had a kiosk or truck closer to the strip.

Service is good, some staff very knowledgeable, others there for just a check. From the craigslist job post, it makes it seem like this establishment would be a completely vegan and plant based one. Once I made the trip, I realized that they use animal's products, like Greek yogurt and some type of butter, which makes no sense because who wants butter in anything at a Juice Shop? 
I think The Juice Standard need to raise it's standards.
Great place and great staff. Ivory went above and beyond while helping me pick my drink. It was my first time visiting, but won't be the last. Keep up the great work!
Best cold-pressed juice blends I've ever tasted. I experienced a 10-day juice cleanse with them and lost 7 lbs. The cleanse was a breeze because their juice was SO good. I love TJS!
great spot - close to the house, friendly staff and great drinks - simple deal.  Ive been back many times

The owner Jamie is extremely helpful and sweet. The best juices in Vegas. The veggie juices are thin and light and the dessert/sweet juices are thick and filling- how they should be(opposite of suja)!
Mmmmm. Loving this jive new place! It's cute and the juices are awesome. Taste test any and all.

The service was very good. They had my cleanse ready for pick up at designated time. I had to go 3 times days to pick up. I would have given them 5 stars but the taste of the juices varied extremely. I did a 10 cleanse so went for 3 separate batches. The good thing is that the variance in flavor means it's made in small batchs but some days it was lemon juice overload. I did not lose any weight but it did clear me of all carb cravings. It's a tad pricey but fresh fruit and vegetables are also expensive.

Just had a really great experience in this juice bar. First thing I noticed was that the cashier washed his hands and use gloves as he helped me try a couple samples to decide what I wanted. I'm currently on a juice cleanse so I went with the Bee Resilient 100% juice with fresh spinach Romain cucumber kale parsley micro greens lemon and ginger. You can definitely taste the parsley in this one, but that's what I wanted. Everything I need for a clean Green Day. I will definitely be returning!
I really enjoyed my Berry Antioxidant smoothie. My only complaint is the price:$14.07 for a smoothie . But it's hard to be healthy on the strip, so I'm just happy I found this place.
Amazing recipes, friendly and educated staff, and organic ingredients! Delicious and good for you!

Even though this place is all the way across town from where I live it is worth the drive every week to get cold pressed juices from here. 

The staff is always friendly and I remember that the first time here I was a bit
overwhelmed with all the selections they had.  The gentleman at the counter asked questions to see which juices I preferred and then gave me samples to try so we could narrow down the ones I wanted to leave with. 

I also learned that they give their juices a 4 day expiration from the time pressed even though the health department states that they may have a shelf life of 7 days. The greatest part is that all of the ingredients are organic. So the price point is perfect when you think about the quality of ingredients you are getting. Another plus is that when you bring back the bottle to them for recycling they give you a $1 credit to use. 

My favorite is the Bee WHealthy because I enjoy juices with more greens than fruits. Also, Bee Effective is delicious because they add coconut water to the greens which adds a sweet touch. It's so good that even the boyfriend drinks them and he never eats greens or fruits. I find this a perfect way to incorporate a healthy start to any day.

Excellent!!!! & Organic!!!!
The best tasting cold pressed juice I've ever had. The combinations they offer are outstanding. Delicious!! I'm totally addicted.

This place is the bomb!  Juices are freshly pressed and they provide free samples, so there's no mystery on what you purchase.  Their selections are plenty and they are very informative on what benefit each juice does.  

The only thing is when they run out, they run out and you will have to come back again the next day.  I made the mistake going in on Saturday and they were out of my first 4 selections.  It was frustrating but I guess this is a good frustration because you know everything is made fresh.  

The price is a bit steep but it's about the same almost every where, so for first timer, be prepare for the tag price but you will not get any fresher juices than fresh pressed from here.  I encounter someone that even drove out of their way from The Strip to get some juices.

Green & Good juice from "J" Love - Excellent!  Very nice staff they provided samples of various juices. All of them tasted pretty good.  I will be back for more Love Juice... aka G&G... and a few others....
This place is awesome. I love their espresso drinks, but $1.50 to add honey or agave to a latte? Unheard of :/

I love these juices. Instantly I feel a difference. I have more energy, clearer thoughts, and feel the buzz. The Juice Standard is the very best. Everything is organic. The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. You will love The Juice Standard!

So I've been coming here for over 9 months now and let me tell you absolutely AMAZING!!!!!

I f'cking love Juice! I can't believe how hooked I am. Their juice is impact with delicious flavors from organic fruits and vegetables. 

The staff are all really great. They help you select the right juice for you whether your just juicing for dieting, to help allergies or for healthy reason... They know their products very well.  You can sample the juices before you purchase which is a big plus. 

One of the owners I met was such a sweetie.  You can tell she loves what she does. Not to mention she gorgeous. She looks like a model. She pretty much sells her products just by standing there. 

What I love about their juice is that it doesn't have that grainy texture. Their nut-milks are perfectly smooth and subtle. I'm all about their nut-milks!  It's the best meal replacer for my busy schedule.

The bottles are a bit pricey but when you calculate the process, labor, especially love and care to make these flawless drinks you'll appreciate the prices more.

By far the best juice shop I've tried!

This review is over due. I did the one day cleanse last year and let me tell you it cleansed. But more importantly all of their juices are delicious, I especially love the nut milk and the BeeWhealthy.
Love this place! Delicious juices and great staff! Anytime I need a diet reset I'll pick up a weekend cleanse :)

I absolutely love this place!!! The girls that own it are so sweet and helpful.  The place is beautiful. Very welcoming!!!!

I did a 5 day cleanse. I am not normally the type to go that long on a diet like this without cheating but i actually made it thru the whole 5 days. The first 3 days were definitely the hardest but after that smooth sailing. I also work 7 days a week so I thought for sure I wouldn't have enough energy to do it but I was completely fine. I didn't feel hungry at all. I drank a juice every 2 hours because I work long days I wanted to stretch it out so I would be starving late at night. 

I did this cleanse to reboot my system. I have been having problems with my thyroid and I wanted to see if detoxing would help. It definitely did!!! I feel great and have a ton of energy!!! Very happy with the results. I really wasn't expecting to lose much weight doing this considering it was only 5 days but I actually lost 9lbs. Which I'm thrilled about.  I would recommend this to anyone looking to begin a healthier lifestyle and feel better about themselves. Happy Juicing:)

I'm really happy to know this place exists for those times I don't want to make my own juice. However - I know their juice is only on the shelf for up to 4 days (standards are up to 7), with all those beautiful veggies and fruit behind the counter I'd prefer if my juice was pressed on the spot. That and the fact they seem to have over-refined their concept to the point it seems commercial. I don't know what it is, but it would feel even healthier if it felt like a more one-off place (which I believe it actually is). 

The staff is incredibly nice and the atmosphere relaxed. They serve organic espresso as well (awesome!). You can bring back your bottle for a small discount on your next juice purchase which helps swallow the price. The price doesn't bother me much knowing how many veggies and fruit it actually takes to make a juice, plus it being organic, that's just the way it is. 

I recommend this place for all as health is extremely important and the quality is great!

Um YASS ! Love this place. They never let me down, not in terms of advice or product. I usually order the same few things bc I'm scared to branch out and be disappointed haha. But consistency is usually on point no matter who makes it. Try it out! Everything is organic and cold-pressed :) And definitely stick to this location (see my review of one of the other locations! ).

This was my local juice bar that I would head to after going to LVAC on Flamingo. The juice is always fresh and I'm hooked on Bee Happy and Bee Magnificent.

While the shop is small with hardly any places to sit and gets crowded the atmosphere is always friendly and staff very patient and helpful when you're asking a lot of questions.

As far as price, it's a bit pricey but it is Summerlin and it's to be expected after all they are serving fresh pressed, organic juice.

I was so excited to check this place out,  I've been to Pressed for Juice & love it but I really wanted to try this lil spot too, so there I went. I was greeted promptly with a smile,  the young girl asked if I had been here before, when I answered no,  she yelled "we have a first timer here" that was weird lol anyway while reading through the menu she asked if I had questions or specific flavors I like (sweet, green etc) I told her that i noticed "Dandelion" in alot of the drinks and I don't care for the floral taste. She proceeded to recommend the most popular one "BeeWHealthy" I took the sample and what do I taste? "Dandelion" yup on the ingredient list =/ I wish maybe someone with more knowledge and experience with ingredients was at the front counter...I ended up ordering the Acai Crunch and for that I give the 3 stars, it was really good but was given to me in a cup with a lid and a spoon.... in which the spoon does not come through the hole in the lid? That was annoying and a tease until I could get home, remove the lid and finally enjoy it. Pressed for Juice has theirs in a bowl and is delicious as well and overall just a better experience for me.

I love this place- the packaging is high-quality,  the space is pretty and bee-themed (love the honeycomb chalkboard signage!), and the juices are downright delicious! I appreciate the fact that they use high-quality ingredients and source from nearby California, and I especially love that their juices are bottled to take and enjoy over the next few days. Add in that they're raw, organic, non-HPP, and everything else Gwyneth Paltrow would approve of, and you've got a stellar product. 

I recently moved here from the Bay area and was unpleasantly surprised that so many places here in LV claim that they have juice, only to give me an overpriced rinky-dink plastic cup with a non-harmonious medley of fruits and veggies. I am sorely missing vendors like Juicer Heroes, Project Juice, and the ever-convenient Pressed.

I am so happy to find a company putting forth the quality of product that I expect when I am juicing. I will admit to being a little put off by pricing- which is $10+/bottle, higher even than trendy Cali prices, by a good 20%. They have a niche product though, and their portions are slightly larger. I will definitely be taking advantage of their bottle-return discounts though. I would like to be able to pull up nutritional info on each particular juice online, as it is not posted on the bottle itself: their website also is well-designed and informative, just as they are in-store. 

Overall: service is friendly, space is attractively decorated, and the product itself is high-quality. I hope to see more local companies picking up the slack and providing more options that are on par with the standard set here at Juice Standard! I hope they add some sort of loyalty program for frequent juicers as they settle in- I love a liquid lunch but I can't swing $300/month for it.

Favorite juices so far are Bee Effective (greens), Bee On Point, and Bee Loved.
Ive been going here for months and this place is now how I manage my weight! The Bee Whealthy and Bee Grateful are two of my favorites!

I love The Juice Standard. 
It was recommended to me by a coworker who know the owner, Jamie. Jamie is a delight. She is knowledgeable and passionate about what she is doing and has quality product to back it up.
I am not a health nut by any means, and I HIGHLY enjoyed them. I will be returning and telling everyone I know.

Love, love, love their juices. The lady was kind enough to let me and my friends try the entire menu and educated us with all the different benefits of each drink. A little on the pricier side but they use all organic produce. I'm hooked! :)

My smoothie looks very scary green... But it tastes wonderful. It has all natural organic avocado, kale, coconut, almond milk, banana, agave, and is call a lipo smoothie,  absolutely love this new little gem. My holistic dentist told me about it.

Visited here as my boyfriend's co-workers have been raving about the place. Located in a strip mall, the outdoor tables with potted plants and the fancy oak countertop added a cute, different vibe to the place. The staff was great, offering to walk us through the entire menu with samples of all of their juices and nut milk. Most of the juices were good, some were outstanding, and we really enjoyed the nut milk. Ordered a smoothie and some juices to go and the smoothie was so good. Prices are high for me to visit here very often, but the juice was fresh, tasty, and it was clear that the employees are truly excited about the product they have to offer.

The Juice Standard is a nice, tiny shop that sells juice bottles as the name suggests.

100% organic, tastes good, and understandably, prices are on the high end.

The Juice Standard is my spot!

I absolutely love all of their juices, and they have a VERY friendly and knowledgable staff.

I've stopped in several times, but thought it might be time to drop them some Yelp love because they are a locally owned business that loves their local customers.

Each time that I've stopped in, I've had different questions, symptoms...and whatnot. The staff is always down to answer any questions. Go ahead. Try to stump them.

They're all well-trained and friendly. The juices are fresh, and tasty. Pricing is on-par with most other cold-pressed spots, and when your return your bottles, you get a buck off for each return.

If you are adventurous and seeking thrills, try the wellness or flu shots. They are spicy, but after a couple days of regular doses (is that the right phrase?), you'll feel like a million bucks.

Word on the street is that they might be opening a spot in Green Valley. I'm never over there, but for those of you that are...that should bode well for you.

I've worked at another juice bar for over 6 months, our prices were about 5$ cheaper... But that's because the produce was not organic (even though we swear up and down it is). The juice standard is the thing that changed me and made me love juice. There product is 100% organic and absolutely great tasting. The staff is so sweet and management is appropriate unlike the other one down the street... If you guys want to drink 100% organic juice, that is reasonable for what you are paying for, definitely go to the juice standard! Elle is the sweetest manager, and they give you a dollar back!

They have the purest juices and smoothies in Vegas. I've tried nearly every juice bar in town and I make them myself, but I keep coming back to TJS! Plus, the staff is so informed! They guide you through all the options in such a friendly and loving way. It's inspiring to see their passion. Love this spot!

Been a customer since 2005 i know the owners there when they used to serve the tea, the staff that's serving now are great people! Hard working and very friendly especially Ice she always makes my drink very good as well as the other people there make it good too! Natural fruits is the only way to go! Thanks and yes you guys are the #1 boba in las Vegas! Aloha! Steve from Aloha Tinting
I love Juice, and if you love juice come here. I literally drink their nutmilk bee magnificent everyday! Obsessed and the service is always great!

I am so happy this juice bar opened up and right in my neighborhood. I came here during their soft opening and it seemed like they already had some regulars as I noticed them calling someone by name.

When I walked in, I immediately liked the look of the inside with the menu and the pamphlets, cute names of products, and helpful tips with juicing. The owners were very helpful and Marcella explained to me all about their juices, how they are made, and the benefits. I appreciated the taste test area because of course we all want to know what we are going to get.  I was interested in a 3 day juice cleanse but seeing that I have never juiced an entire day, I was not sure how I would respond or if I could handle it. I ended up only doing one day. 

The Magnificent- filtered water, raw cashew, agave, vanilla bean, and cinnamon. 
perfect at night time when you have been juicing all day. It felt like a treat and I don't know what it was but I was unable to finish it. I'm not sure if it was the juice overload or what did it. 

I also liked the Energized, the Love, and the one with cayenne pepper. I like the glass bottle packaging but can I say it does not do well with drinking straight out of the bottle, lots of spills. Maybe you are expected to pour it or use a straw. The small plastic bottles are much easier to drink right out of. 

I would like to try the juice cleanse again but probably when I don't have to work and can stay home. I appreciate the $1 off for bringing back the bottles. I wish they had some sort of loyalty card or system though because the cost is pretty high for me. 

I know Marcella mentioned the juices have a 4 day shelf life but I wonder if the date on top was the expiration date or the date made. My juices had different dates on top. 

In all I am happy a healthy place like this opened up near home where I can come get some good quality juice.

I love attempting to convince myself of living a healthier lifestyle! 

I came here & spent nearly $60 for juice! I then went to Yoshinoya & Krispy Kreme. Who am I fooling!?!? 

Ok let's move on because there's no helping me. This place really has it going on. It's very clean, very cute & the juice presentations are awesome. It definitely inspires one to get healthy even if that lasts for only an hour. 

I walked in & was immediately greeted by the nicest kid who is eager to sample me up & we had a lot of fun trying nearly everything. Sampling is the smartest thing ever because it really gets us in the mood to spend more money & I instantly knew what I could attempt to drink and what I absolutely couldn't. I love that he tried getting me in on the healthiest ones which I had a hard time swallowing. Grass isn't my favorite flavor. Some of these juices were way too hard core for me however I was pleasantly surprised that some of them tasted really good! So I went for it & splurged! They have so many great fresh ingredients such as apples, cucumbers, celery, lemons, kale, beets, Brazilian nuts, vanilla & so much more! 

My plan is to skip lunch & juice it up at work. We shall see how long I last before someone forces me to eat something because I'm extra mean when hangry. This stuff is all natural & organic & I'm excited! Hopefully I have some will power before my mom gets back in town & I find myself dying in Zion again :)

Hi mom :) Love you! 
(My mom loves reading my reviews) lol
Pricey but worth it! If you return the glass bottles you get $1 off. They open early too which is great.

Yesterday afternoon 2 young men were passing out flyers in my neighborhood for juice standard, I pass that corner everyday and didn't realize it was there. The information and the passion they had for the juice was very admirable. I spent a good 20 mins talking to Avery and Ronaldo, they told me their favorite juices and the benefits of them. Came to find out they work at the cosmopolitan location, so I ended up going to the one by my house and OMG it was amazing I had my daughter go back again today and I will be there again tomorrow. They told me they will be back around again this week, I can't wait to thank them for introducing me to this place. We are regulars now.

Great tasting, healthy drinks & snacks. The employees know all about the nutritional value, and the qualities derived from each ingredient. Had been sick and they made great suggestions for a "wellness" drink. Always very fresh, and they open early (7:00 a.m.) so I stop for early morning nutritional drink instead of eating a heavy breakfast.
This place is now a part of my daily regimen. Great selection, I feel good. Love the Juice Standard.

Our first and last visit unfortunately. Was excited items to find another juice/nutmilk store to compare to roots and fruits. Arrived on a Monday to sample some of the delicious cashew milks advertised on their website-nope, they were out of both. Husband reluctantly ordered a green smoothie (made with coconut water, cashew milk makes it creamier) and from there it went down hill. When we originally walked in we were only customers, but soon there was a line of 3-4. Other employees came out to help and somehow we were pushed aside while their "regulars" were quickly helped, we were the last ones to come out after they waited on the rush. They don't need our business badly enough, plus their nutmilks are $12/bottle vs Roots 'n Fruits $8-eek!!
Love snagging a smoothie or juice from TJS!  This little spot is always refreshing.  The people are great, the store is really cool and the food is delicious.  Spot in if you haven't yet!

I love this place too much to give them a 1 star but I really don't think they should still close early on Sunday lolol but they're always super friendly and always very helpful and I can't help but come here at least once a week. They have detox cleanses too but that's like $70 a day up to 3 days total. Anyways juice standard is on the $$ end but the juices are worth it and the workers try their best to serve their customers as best as they can and I'm probably gonna come back here again next week haha

The Juice Standard is amazing!  I passed by the store on my way to work and this morning and made sure to stop on my way home. I have never had juice before but have been researching it and even considered buying a juice cleanse from an online company. Jaime is SO knowledgable and informative and allowed me to try any of the juices that I wanted before I bought them. I will definitely be going back tomorrow to get more!

Ok so 've been really putting off coming to this juice place for awhile knowing that they are quite pricy. But boy is it worth it.

Especially if you are a hard core juicer or if you just like to juice to stay healthy you know how expensive it is to juice yourself. But besides all that the juice here are so yummy and it takes away all the complication of juicing yourself. 

Juicing at home can be messy and take a super long time so it is extremely convenient to just stop in and pick up a delicious jar of freshly squeeze juice. 

They offer a wide verity of flavors and they are so good. Try the tasting when you get a chance to sample some of the flavors so you know which ones you like. They run about $9 a bottle and when you bring the glass bottle back you get $1 back towards your next purchase. 

I love The Juice Standard and didn't think I would BEE addicted!

Walked in today after doing some research. The woman, who's name I can't remember! Was amazing she gave me a sample of just about every single juice they had, ALL of which were AMAZING!!!!! She was super informative on the ingredients as well as the benefits of each juice. Needless to say they have earned a returning customer! And they offer support for juicing at only $60 a day. (If you've tried it at home this well worth every penny)

Incredible variety of juices and they even have cashew milks.  The staff is so friendly and they let you try anything!  Reading the menu at first can be daunting but they will gladly walk you through it.  They offer a $1 off your next purchase if you return your glass bottles washed. Would give 5 stars but the pricing seems high to me... $9 for 16 oz of one of the cashew milk blends.  I also tried a green smoothie with kale, avocado and coconut and it was delicious.

Honestly I walked into The Juice Standard and my day was made. The employees were so helpful and kind. A girl named Mia helped me decide which juice I should get and she steered me in the right direction. Her kind voice and sweet personality made me blush. Latifa also helped me out a lot. Her upbeat mannerisms made me smile. I'm definitely coming back here soon.

This place is highly addicting.   I stop by once a day for coffee , juice or even the food .  Staff is friendly and   Knowledgeable about food and all produce and supplements that are in juice selection.

Amazing staff!  I went in for lunch after already picking what I wanted online.  El greeted me when I walked in right away. And even offered samples.  She was very knowledgeable! I was blown away and based on the info she provided I ended up changing what I originally choose and getting BEE MAGNIFICENT it was amazing.  I definitely plan on going bck.  And when I grow a pair I will start the 3 day cleanse.  Lol

I'm addicted to this place! Love rehydrating here and getting protein after workouts. The staff is super helpful and they have so many juices to choose from they can cater to your needs. Can get pricey tho. That's the only reason I didn't give 5 stars. Two big thumbs up!

So far, this place has the best acai crunch bowl I've ever had. I've taken multiple people here, and once they have it they agree! If it's too much for you, they are nice enough to give you an option to split it in half. I order mine with honey on top! 

I have had their wellness shot multiple times. It usually helps when you think you might be getting sick. 

I've also done their 3 day Standard Fast cleanse with the red and green juices and the cashew milk at the end of the day. The first day was a little bit of a struggle, I didn't think I'd make it through the rest of the days, but the next day I woke up feeling different. I was able to make it through no problem. They give you lots of support through the whole process. I had lots of questions about what I should eat after the cleanse. They were happy to answer any questions I had. 

My favorite juice is Bee chill - is the perfect blend of watermelon and cucumber with a splash of lemon. The perfect refreshing drink to have in the summer time. I usually can't put it down once I open it. I keep sipping it (trying to make it last as long as possible) until it's gone. 

I'd recommend this place to everyone!

I walked in Feeling sick. Then I met Stacie. She is a true Educator in The juice World. She told me about the Shot flight. I tried and After 30 minutes I suddenly started to Feel better. I do Recommend  this juice bar more than any others. I would always support they are t

I was SO grateful for this place when in Vegas. It was the health boost I needed desperately while in town for a bachelorette party. I stayed in The Cosmopolitan so this was very convenient and made me feel some semblance of healthy while we were partying. I got smoothies and juices and yogurt parfaits while I was here and everything was delicious. All the ingredients were flavorful and fresh. The prices were insane but pretty much in par with everything else in Vegas, which let me tell you, is insane. 

Thanks for the health Juice Standard!

This is exactly what Vegas needs and I've been waiting for it! I meant to go eventually but I didn't think I would run into it the day after I discovered it on Instagram. I took a star off because they are a bit pricey.  I've gotten juices for cheaper at other places.  Also, in the cleanse, I wish there had been more variety.  Of the 8 drinks each day, 4 of them are green juices, so I got tired of constantly drinking those.  HOWEVER, I did do this cleanse during the winter when a lot of fruits/vegetables aren't available, so perhaps in the spring and summer they rotate in some other flavors.

BEE-yond AMAZING!!!! As an avid juicer rom California, I've tasted the BEST of the best when it comes to organic, cold-pressed juice and let me tell you there is NOTHING like this place. They truly set the bar for cold-pressed JUICE!

I was beyond mesmerized by the incredible selection of delicious juices that taste like they've been crafted by a Michelin Star chef. Each juice is a delicious concoction that was created to meet every need from simple hydration, to glowing skin to liver cleansing. I also loved that they use glass bottles instead of plastic, I re-use my glass bottle by filling it up with snacks like almonds and keeping it healthy on-the-go. Also, they have a rewarding loyalty program where you get a $1 off your next juice if you return the bottle, what a thoughtful way to recycle!

I also love the fact that Jamie and Marcella ( owners) , kindly offer you a tasting menu where you get to try all of the juices prior to buying them ( most juice places in LA do NOT offer this option). They are incredibly knowledgeable about the ingredients, benefits of juicing and take their time to pick the right product for the results you are trying to achieve.

I did the 2 week cleanse and have never felt better! Their bottle sizes are designed perfectly to keep you full and satisfied. They are also very encouraging and always check on you to see how you're holding up during your cleanse to make sure you're not pushing your body overboard.

So happy to have such a healthy and delicious juice bar in Vegas! I'm a loyal customer for life.

This is a bright and vibrant little juice shop with super friendly and knowledgeable staff. As others have mentioned, the staff will walk you through every variety of juice and packages they offer. The best part?? They will let you sample everything with a smile!  

I opted to try their one day juice cleanse. The offer anything from a 1 day cleanse/ 3 day cleanse/ 4+ day cleanse.  Warning: Juice prices are on the high end here. They offer fresh cold pressed organic juice and it doesn't come cheap (understandably so...). I've always wanted to try a cleanse and purchased their prepackaged juice option (see photos). 

Overall, I loved their juices and enjoyed my one day cleanse. I did not do this to drop weight and do not believe that cleanses should be intended for that. I DO think that this is a good way to get a lot of vitamins in your system and think that cleanses are good to reset cravings and kick start a healthy lifestyle program. Besides, I enjoy juices regularly without a cleanse.
Love love!  It's my favorite go to juice place!  The people are so friendly and their juice blends are tasty and consistent.  I usually sub a meal with one of their juices and I'm very satisfied.

Life changing! The Juice Standard is the single greatest thing to happen to the human body since vitamins! Take the three days worth of juices combo/mixture and cleanse your body and your soul. It's $60 a day and the cleanse is for three days, so be ready to part with $180 and change your life!! Renewal! Refreshing! Joy!!  Thank you, Juice Standard!!

Excellent selection of juices and coffee! The food is great as well. I've been here atleast 50 times now for juice and food and every single time the staff are incredibly helpful and super friendly! Definitely check this place out for health food needs!!!

The first time we went here we samples all of the different juices, and the owner sold us on the cleanse package, telling us that if we returned the bottles, that they would give us $1 off per bottle. 

When we got home late afternoon, we noticed 4 of the juices expired that day, and we needed to drink them that evening (not thrilled).  We didn't get the chance to drink them all in time before they expired. 

We decided for us, we would prefer to go buy the juice that we intend to drink instantly. When we went back today, we brought the 12 bottles back, and just wanted 2 drinks.  They told us that they would take the 12 bottles ($12 off), but only give us $2 off this order, with a receipt showing an additional 10 bottles returned.  I explained that we only intend to buy drinks as we drink them, so we won't ever buy 12 at a time again.  They said "that's fine, but we can't give you the discount".

Bottom line:  they are willing to give a discount of $1 per bottle returned. But they will only do it bottle for bottle, meaning that they try to lock you in to buying bulk. I hate small businesses that hide behind bate-n-lock-in "policy" over common sense and putting the customer first. 

Customer service is poor here.
Great juice but I wish for the price they were all organic! The nut milk ones are amazing!

What a great little juice shop. Started to get the flu and decided to add some healthy juices to my diet. Staff was very friendly and helpful as I tried about 20 different juices. Each juice bottle runs between $11 to $13 and has a refrigerator storage life of about 7 days is what is told to you in the store. Make sure to read the date that is on the bottle. Tried all the different flavors and can't say I disliked any of them. One of the cashew milk drinks taste just like horchata. Wanted to try the Watermelon drink, but it was out of season. Nicely decorated on the inside and tends to get really busy throughout the day. Was told they are opening one soon in the Henderson area. All organic is the most common words spoken in this place. So if you are concerned about that, this is the place for you. Great helpful and friendly customer service with a smile.
I swear by the shot flight!!!! It makes me feel amazing & energized after a long night ;)

While out running this afternoon I found this little gem and was so energized after experiencing some of their wonderful beverages. The ambiance of this business is so laid back and encourages a healthy type lifestyle: actually celebrates all things healthy. Their beverages are geared to energize one both body, mind, and soul. The clerk was fantastic at explaining all the beverage choices that were available that I might enjoy, and he shared with me his favorites as well. 

On the cashiers information I tried the Matcha Latte. I was scared to try it since it is coffee based and green in color. It was very smooth with no after taste, and I was even expecting one. I guess the matcha green tea should of tipped me off that it would be green, but with it having espresso as well I was not sure. The açaí it the espresso latte was right on target too and really good for ones health. 

When I was paying for the matcha latte I was sort of drawn to some of there house drinks that come in these small looking glass milk type bottles. Which is so retro, after one drinks the juice then the bottle can be washed and reused with no deposit either. I tried the Bee Cosmopolitan flavor . It comes in a healthy pink color too. It tasted like lemon aid, with agave, beets, and lemon as some of the ingredients. It was so refreshing making less of a crash later when I went home after my run was over.

Herr yea!  A local juice bar i'm down to support.  They bottle their juice at the store with locally farmed raw produce without HPP (High Pressure Processing).  HPP is just a method to extend shelf life, and from what i read it has very little effects in characteristic of molecular food compounds; taste, vitamins, and nutrients.  Hence why Juice Standards are super duper fresh, Bee!  Without the HPP they're also able to package their cold-press juice in glass bottles which you can return each for a $1 discount off your next purchased.  Bottles are $10 each for 16.9oz and there are many to choose from.  

I eat pretty bad since i have retarded hours [but mainly because you, f-nuts (i mean that in the nicest way possible) always yelp tasty looking spots] , so i've always try to include green juice in my daily intake when im on the go esp when i wake up on an empty stomach.  Thankfully i don't need all that fiber i'm missing out on, and other than that I don't really mess with any other root or fruit juice.  Personal choice.

So this store is really cool because when you walk in you can see huge cambros full of raw veggies through the glass refrigerator doors.  They do everything in house, not in the front i would think but in the back.  They just store some in the front along with ready to be purchased juice bottles or samples with the help of Jamie or Marcella who are both knowledgable about their products.  Today, I was able to pick out my fav green juice, Bee Love (Carrots, Celery, Parsley, Spinach) from them with Jamie's guidance. 

I've also picked up Bee Effective (Apple, Zucchini, Spinach, Swiss Chard, Radish, Celery, Romaine, Kale, Parsley, Coconut Water), and it says it contain tree nuts, but it's actually the coconut. 

And just because of allergy season I never got to try, but I got two bottles of the Bee True To You(Cucumber, Lemon, Ginger, Turmeric, Honey, Cayenne) which has some local Honey in it.  I doubt two bottles will have any effect of the outcome, but i still want to try anyways.  Tasted good but got a nice throat kick to it with it.

Juice Standard has an amazing thing going on.  I've only see a juice bar like this in cali, but these ladies have more confident in their own products which having me believing in them too.  And about once a week i'll need reassurance.  

Tip:  Savor your juice.  Swirling in your mouth is important part of digestive system.  Your saliva has Ptyalin, an enzyme that helps break down food and speed up chemical reaction so your body can retain more nutrient.

I love this juice bar!!! You have options from meal replacement, energy, and also refreshing drinks. Although the nut juices were delicious I stuck with the lighter options.  This is a great bar to get a loved one to intake their vegetables.. (AKA my boyfriend lol). He never eats vegetables and loved the Bee Excellent and also Bee on Point :). I went with the Bee Alkaline, which is a lighter option of cucumber, celery, kale, and radish.  I highly recommend Bee Pure and Bee Whealthy as well! Great place for giving you $1.00 in cash for every bottle returned as well. Great service everytime I come in!!!

I am loyal to juice standard!  They're literally 2 minutes away and knowledgable and very sweet.  The glass bottles are THE reason I go here and not anywhere else,  well and cause it's close by.  They give you a dollar for each bottle you bring back.  I decorated my carrier and they compliment it.   of it wasn't for juice standard I might've not broken my Starbucks runs, even though I just got chai and green tea drinks there.  I haven't had their smoothies but people don't seem to like those.  So I give 5 stars since I have nothing to complain about.
This place rocks. They let you taste everything, just ask nicely! My favorite is the Bee Happy.

This place just opened in the southwest area LV. Im super excited! The girl at the register helped me with the taste testing of every juice they sell. Some were amazing and some were ok. It depends on your choice of taste. She was very knowledgable on all the drinks. The juices break down to whats in it and what it is good for. They have certain memberships if your interested but I was just there for a bottle or two. I choose the "abundant" and the "royal" $11 a drink. One nutty and one fruity. I suggest you taste test before purchasing! It helps a lot more. The bottles are glass and if you bring back the glasses you save $1 on your next purchase. How sweet is that. I'll be back to purchase more drinks. They are kinda pricey but think of each drink as a healthy meal replacement.
   
3/26/14.
A couple days later and I am back to try their juice cleanse! A one day juice cleanse package is $60, it includes 8 12oz bottles to drink for the full day. 3 WHealthy, 2 Love, 1 Pure, 1 energized, and 1 Magnificent (kinda like dessert for the night). Me and my boyfriend decided to do it together to see how it feels. They number the bottles for you to know exactly what you need to drink every 1 1/2- 2 hours. I'm pretty excited. A one day cleanse every two weeks or every month would not hurt. I would do this once a week if I could afford it. Haha Thank You Jamie for your help! :)

I've been to so many juice places (live in Southern California) and this is by far the highest quality, and most delicious juices and milks. My boyfriend and I were overwhelmed with how cute the spot it and the people that were there were so helpful. 

Not to mention they had bulletproof coffee. If I lived in Vegas, it would be extremely difficult not to come daily! We went 2x/day last time we were in Vegas.

Just wanted to edit my review here and that I stopped going here because the owner has been weird/borderline rude the past couple times I have been here.  She put down other juicing places claiming that they might have children and implied that that means they are probably dirty and you can get sick because the juices aren't pasteurized.  I thought this was supposed to be a positive place- I understand giving a friendly warning but it really came off as putting other juicing places down.  Say nothing rather then be negative.  Another time I paid cash, but she forgot to give me $1 off for my bottle and said she would give me the $1 off next time.  (She is the owner why not just open the register and give me the $1?)  Well next time she did not give me the $1 off, and of course it is $1 so I was not going to be that petty and ask for it!  Yet another time she lowered her voice dramatically and told me I need to wash the bottles out a little better next time.  Ok, no issues if she thinks they could have been rinsed out a bit more but the way she said it was just totally weird.  I will reiterate to you they were not that unclean or growing mold or fermenting and were rinsed out.  Another time I was introducing my friend to The Juice Standard and let her have one of my bottles for the $1 off, and the owner made us both feel like this was totally cheap of us and acted annoyed.  Another thing is when you pay with a credit card here the tablet has large tipping suggestions of different percentages and what the suggested tip would be.  If the owner is ringing you up and you are giving her your business it seems odd to my friends and I that she's asking for your business and tips.  I could be out of line here but it was just awkward when my girlfriend purchased a few days worth of a cleanse then felt obligated to pay more for gratuity because she didn't want to be a jerk and wasn't sure what the proper procedure here is.  She ended up paying an extra $18 for the cleanse for the gratuity.  There is a small box that states "no tip" but it is very small and if you check that box the owner remains mute about it but you can tell she is kinda peeved.  I had really liked the juices here and I do think they have great juices but the owner seems very neurotic and definitely drove my business away.  My girlfriends who also were going here agree with me and we are now getting our juices elsewhere.  I can hear the owner now cackling how we will get sick off other people's juices...

Very refreshing juice spot overall. Close to the LVAC on 215/Flamingo. 
Delicious fresh pressed juices and a few smoothie options. They also provide a 10-15 minute demo with explanations of all their juices and why particular ingredients provide the explosions of flavors in every sip. Polite , well - trained staff and a very clean , classy décor. If you are a health-nut, fitness monster, or somebody just that wants to feel better , you SHOULD definitely check this place out.

These ladies are pressing up the most delectable dietary delights in Las Vegas! It's a five star experience all the way to organic nirvana.

HPP means high pressure pressing. All USDA organic, non GMO. A lot of their produce is sourced from California, which means a smaller carbon footprint. Their bottling is either glass (all class) or plastic, and the plastic bottles are, of course, BPA free. What's not to love?

If that's not enough to entice you, the radiant ladies they have behind the counter (or the adorable Queen Bees that are wandering the floor this afternoon) are incredibly friendly AND knowledgable. Their concept goes beyond trendy. When they began to tell me about how certain vitamins will be absorbed 100% because of the pairings with other vegetables, and a mention of trace minerals (87 in BeWhealthy, if you're counting), I knew I had come to the right place! It's a breath of fresh air having nutrition that makes sense and does work for you, instead of just adding chia seed to everything and calling it healthy.

Their selection of smoothies are limited to a mere four, but they run the gamut of every avenue of nutrition you need. Fruit based, protein based, veggie based, and fat based (think coconut, avocado). They have superfood add-ons as well such as chia, hemp, flax, coconut meat, bee pollen, spirulina, nutritional yeast.. The list goes on. I've tried all but the protein smoothie and can confidently say they are delicious and filling! I love my liquid lunches on the go.

The space itself is gorgeous and inspiring, the branding and bottling is sexy, the juices are not only good for you, but specifically crafted to be delicious while beneficial to your health. Bee well!
The best organic cold pressed juices. Love this place. Addicted to the Green Cleanse. Try the Acai Bowl. Everything Eco friendly in glass bottles....

Great, organic juices. Probably the best here in Vegas. I always feel food after getting juice here.

Sure, I wish they had the creativity of Function Juicery down the street, but at least here they use lower toxin, high nutrient ingredients which will knock your socks off!

Also a very cool looking little place. Matches the modern times of yoga and Range Rovers more than the hippy juice places of yore. :)

They also have a glass bottle recycling program here remiscent of Germany. Very cool. 

Glass is really the way to go. It is nontoxic, unlike the plastic used at poison juice places, and better for the planet, too. I have never understood putting awesome, healthy ingredients into an unhealthy bottle that leaches poison into juices. I am so very glad they understand that here at The JUICE Standard. Massive kudos!

Overall, this is a shop trying to and actually succeeding at doing just about everything right. 

I do have a couple of wishes, however.

The first thing I wish they had was self-serve, because like a or of people, I like to hold and look at the juices... Read the ingredients. Figure out what I like. 

Asking someone behind the counter for every little thing does inhibit sales to volume buyers like me somewhat. :) From the outset looking in, it looks like it has grab n' go case, but it's not. It could be. And it would be awesome.

Secondly, I wish they had some raw food options. Their juices are great. I bet their raw food would be, too!

I love juicing!!!! It's a nice detox for a day or two. This is located in a complex not too hard to find. The store is very small but the decor is still very nice ! I came in and the staff were very helpful. Customer service is why I'm giving this place a 5 star. There's outside seating and even a dog bowl for water. Duke came with me to run errands today, so he was very happy to see that bowl. Happy juicing !!!!

I LOVE this place! Every time I've gone in there I've received such amazing customer service. My first experience was with Tiana and she was extremely helpful. I truly appreciated her kindness, patience and knowledge. I loved that I could tell her what I was hoping to accomplish like healthy insides such as digestive track, good organs like liver, etc and she would always have wonderful recommendations. 

The best part about my experience was that I was literally able to sample EVERYTHING! that's such a big deal when you're spending anywhere from $9-$13 bucks a bottle, like she said, you want to make sure you're getting what YOU as the customer will enjoy. 

I ended up with several different flavors like Bee On Point, Bee Effective, Bee Chill and Bee Happy which were all delicious. When I returned the next day or two I was helped by another kind employee who unfortunately I didn't catch her name who was also a pleasure to interact with and she recommended their smoothies as well. 

I tried the Acai something which had fresh bananas, coconut flakes, pumpkin seeds and this heavenly granola. It was so scrumptious I went back 2 days in a row and have officially converted my husband thanks to the last employee's kindness who surprised me by making a sample for him to try so I wouldn't have to share mine.

Overall, fabulous experience but yes, a little pricey. But hey, you can't put a price on your health!

One of the best cold pressed juice stands I've been too!!! 
Would recommend the smoothies and health shots. 
Amazing nut milks 
Salads and acia bowls are on point

I'm a big fan of juice, so I was very happy to find out there's one right next to Massage Nirvana. It's so convenient after a massage that The Juice Standard is next door for hydration! I love everything about this place, the juice, the look, the staff, and the options. I went there 3 days ago for the 2nd time, but this time the girl was very helpful and asked me if I wanted to taste before purchasing. That really helped make my choice. The only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars, is because of the high prices. I paid about $25 for 2 bottles of juice, not including tip! I wish I could make this a daily habit of mine, but for this price, it can only be a luxury for me. Definitely will go back after a massage though.

My absolute favorite juice place by far! What I love most about them is that the juice is mostly able to purchase the same day it was pressed, meaning it still has 100% of its nutritional values. My favs are the Bee Grateful and the Bee Cosmo. However, I do wish they had a rewards program like a buy 10 get one free or at least still refunded $1 for bottle return.

I have to start by saying I LOVE the Juice Standard. Every time I visit Vegas, I have to have a juice and mocha. Their mocha is THE best and rivals Philz (which says a lot!). However, this location left much to be desired!! Dude at the counter had tattoos, gauges, looked like he'd be chill AF. He wasn't. He was a snot and would fit in better in Las Vegas. He was uninterested in our order and was not a snot. When someone orders an "iced mocha" don't correct them and say it's called a "raw cacao" when it says MOCHA on the menu. Rude. And annoying. I'll brace the traffic on The Strip before I EVER come back to this location.

These are honestly the sweetest people ever! All of their juices are made twice a day, fresh & organic in house. They also let you switch out any juices you do or don't like for your cleanse to make sure you're happy with everything you're getting. The juices run about $8 per bottle which is pretty on par with all other local shops and online cleanse companies.

The most recent time I came I had the B.F.F. smoothie made with kale, pineapples, banana and alkaline. Super good! The cost was only $9 too for a pretty decent size. 

I'll definitely be back again soon to try one of their cleanses.

Love juice standard!   The 1st juicery in lv and they know what they're doing.   Only wish they offered made to order juices as well.  

In comparison to other juiceries, the end product is super flavorful.   
Cons:  super pricey and I think they may be losing a group of customers to whole foods because I know sometimes some of us want to create our own recipes!  Just food for thought. 

 Great knowledgeable staff though!

This place definitely lives up to the name, they are the standard that I hold all my juices up to. A lot fail miserably, unfortunately, so I stick to using my time to juice at home when I'm not going here. 

They have all raw, organic cleanses and I am in love. The bottles are glass and you get $1 off per bottle if you return them when you refill. I actually keep them though for my juices at home because the portion size is perfect per couple hours. 

They are of course on the pricey side when you're talking about glass bottles, raw, organic, but it's completely worth it to set your standards high when you make the decision to juice. I love this place and highly recommend.

I'm so happy I found this place!! Moved here from California and have tried other places here and hadn't found "my" place till now!! Great girls in the front!! Very friendly and knowledgeable!! I love that you get to sample the juices!! Even have amazing looking coffees!! I will be back!!

The juices here are great! Granted I didn't like every single one but most of them are wonderful. I don't remember which ones I've tried but the ones that taste like lemonade are amazing! Their smoothies aren't bad either. They are a little pricey but I think they're worth it. I love the bottles that they come in! 

The workers are welcoming and knowledgeable, which is rare at juicing places. I love that they let you sample anything before buying!

I was having severe abdominal pain for almost a week and even with a visit to urgent care, I couldn't figure out what was going on. A medical professional mentioned that it may be my gallbladder and prescribed me three medications that unfortunately didn't help! After having another attack, I took matters into my own hands and decided to research foods that naturally help your gallbladder and most importantly, avoid irritating it.

I found that vegetable juices like beet, cucumber, tender baby greens, swiss chard, dandelion greens, beet greens, celery, carrots, ginger, and tumeric are great for gallbladder health as well as organic grape and apple juices. Other helpful foods to add to juices: lemon, avocado, vinegar, berries, papaya, pears, and flax and hemp seeds/oils.

Therefore, I was on a mission to find organic, cold-pressed juices that utilized these foods and hoped it would heal me! The store is very easy to find, in fact, I had seen it while driving by on Ft. Apache. Access and parking is simple as well. I love the interior! The adorable bee and honeycomb theme complete with adorable packaging, matching wall art, and the amazing table re-purposed from a tree!

The staff was so friendly, helpful, and insisted on samples. I told him which juices intrigued me and why, so I honed in on Bee WHealthy and Bee On Point. After sampling the two, I chose Bee On Point that is comprised of cucumber, celery, carrot, apple, kale, beet, dandelion, radish, lemon, ginger, turmeric, and pepper (16.9 fl. oz. for $10.99). Neither of the juices really tickled my fancy in the flavor department, however, that truly doesn't bother me nor will it stop me from future consumption because I need to minimize sugar (even natural sugar) intake as much as possible and that's typically what makes juices taste better.

Anyway, the juice was great and filled me for three hours! That was enough time for me to finish what I needed to do for the day and get home for my next meal. The great news is that after just THREE days of eating and drinking the gallbladder-helpful foods, I was able to stop the attacks! It's really wonderful having access to a place like The Juice Standard to have truly healing products when you have health issues. It was honestly the only place I trusted to have something that wouldn't trigger another attack and I was very grateful for it. Your body will heal itself if you give it the right tools. 

FYI: You receive $1 off for each glass bottle returned! But the bottles are so nice, you might want to find a purpose for them at home. Also, keep in mind that these bottles are 99.9% juice which means you're getting the good stuff, not just water or miscellaneous fillers. Yay for cold-pressed!

Loved this place! I can't remember the girls name that helped me, but she was awesome. She let me taste a few different juices before I decided on one which was nice because I'm no juice expert lol. All of them were great but I loved the one nut mylk that tasted like a chai latte.

I love this place! The staff are knowledgeable,  friendly & efficient.  The juice flavors are delicious and ready to go when I get there.  That helps when I am in a hurry and need to grab a juice and go.

I would give them 5 stars if their prices were a little bit lower. 
As for the product itself, 10 STARS!!! Just kidding. But I really do love the flavors, fresh ingredients and location. As a Vegan, I'm always on the look out for new ways to fill my cravings.
Ooooh! Organic pressed juice, what more can I ask for? I love the flavor profile of their concoctions! Will have to try their cleanse one day!

The juices are great however I just stood in there for 15 minutes and two people that got here after me got their drinks made before mine. They were super rude and i will not be back hire new people to work for u because the two there  today are bad for your business

If you're into a guilt free, healthy eating & drinking lifestyle, check out the Juice Standard. There are 3 in town, this location in South Summerlin (by LVAC Flamingo), Henderson and one at The Cosmo which also offers alcohol add-ins.

1st off I love the packaging of the product. The glass bottles are great to reuse for home juicing, decorative use or for seasoning and spices.  They help keep the beverage colder longer.

Ok now to dive into the juices.  They offer a long menu of freshly juiced beverages to accommodate any taste bud. They have sweet, sour, spicey, refreshing, coffee or even protein smoothies for a quick healthy meal on the go. They offer an unlimited tasting menu so you know what you're getting and guaranteed to love your purchase. My favorite is the Bee Cosmopolitan which tastes like pink lemonade and the Bee Excellent which is a nut milk.  

In addition to their drinks, they also offer some food items, vegan friendly. My favorite is the Blueberry Vegan cheesecake. ABSOLUTELY delicious!!

I will continue to return for more amazing drinks and look forward to their growing menu

Their juice cleanse really works. The first day was a little tough-by the end of the first day I had a headache and was nauseous all night. I took that as a definite sign that I was detoxing which is what I wanted. The second day was much easier and I felt a lot better- and by the morning of the third day I felt really good- I also felt like I could keep going on this fast easily for another day or two at least- but unfortunately I had a dinner I had to attend that night so technically I only did it 2.5 days. It helped get rid of my cravings for unhealthy food and I felt like my mind was much more clear. Would definitely recommend either a 1 day or 3 day cleanse- I think there is still a great benefit to just a 1 day cleanse- and once you get past the second day it's really easy to do a 3 day cleanse- if you don't start to get sick of juice by then. Lol I hope to do a 1 day cleanse weekly for a while- or a longer 3-5 day cleanse when I get back from an upcoming trip. I just love how convenient and high quality their juice is too.
The juice is great!  I have tried almost all kinds.  I also love that you can taste the juice before you purchase it.  Very smart marketing to educate the customer before purchasing.

Save the $225 for a three day cleanse and give it to a homeless person as they are the only person that will be hungrier than you will be. 

Perhaps Juice Cleanses aren't for everyone; and I think I would fall into that category. But I guess my expectations were slightly higher, given the very high price of the whole package. 

Bottom line is I should have researched more about this fad, as I think a juice cleanse might be more effective if it were tailored to each person's age, height, weight, etc. The "Standard Cleanse" was a waste of my hard earned money, and I will pursue other avenues for a healthy lifestyle.

Can you say Dee-Lish! If your looking for a good juice place Look no further this place has it all their drinks are great and so is the food. They are fresh , healthy , and tasty !! And to top it off The excellent   staff is so friendly . I just love this place!
The best and only place for me for cold pressed organic juice blends that make being healthy a delicious choice!

Excellent shop for cold pressed juices and smoothies. Highly recommend for any yogis out there. 

Had the Acai crunch bowl and the bee grateful juice. So yummy. Free samples too. 

All of their juices are organic and made on premise.

I came in just to kill time and I spent $40 on juice. And I'm not even mad lol.. I'm really happy actually. Amber was super sweet and helpful, and knows a lot about the products. She gave samples and explained their health benefits. A+  customer service. She was super enthusiastic, you can tell she cares about her job and customers. I'll be back soon! :)

It's simply perfection in every bottle. The stuff there is very professional and the place looks always  super clean. Before you choose what to drink they offer tastes of any juice on the menu.
Definitely the best juice place in Las Vegas.

I came here on a Monday yes MONDAY morning when they were barely opening. I never know what to expect anymore when I go to juice places, nice people or stuffy staff its usually one or the other. The Juice Standard exceeded my expectations in customer service. They took the time to show me samples and inform me on what each vegetable blended into the juice would do to my body. I did see them making fresh juice, however they gave me a bottle that was already ready. Which was still delicious but I felt I was missing out on the fresh, here ya go, feeling. Overall it's a pretty cool place, nice staff, cool ambiance and is close to the gym. Is a little pricy so will have to visit only when I feel like splurging...

Im doing a juice fast, and this place is great. First time here and I love it. I got to try many kinds of different juoces before deciding and all their juice is fresh, in glass bottles,  and most importantly ORGANIC . FIVE STARS because Ive been to places like this in LA but the ingredients they use for their juices amazing. Their wasnt one juice I didnt like. 
Will come again.

I love cold pressed juice. 
I have tried about three juice from here. 
I love the fact that they use glass bottle not plastic. 
I wish they would be open later in the night but their hours are from 8-8 
More likely be trying more once they open their location at TruFusion

So the first time that I came here the girls behind the counter were so sweet and patient with me. I asked for a few different samples of the milks and juice and they totally obliged with KINDNESS. I am sitting here today again and I feel so UNCOMFORTABLE.  The guy behind the counter is sooo rude!! I walked in and no hello just basically "what's up. What do you need?"  I told him that I wanted a couple samples and gave me a blank stare. He made my drink then just left the samples on the counter without letting me know they were there, my head was down writing this review. When he was finished with my drink he just pointed down to the samples like there you are.  Super rude!!! Def uncomfortable coming back again. Also i ordered the power protein smoothie from him. Not as good as the first time.

I don't remember the exact date but I know I came on National Women's Day after being greeted by one of the owners. :) Though it's pretty pricey every penny was worth it! I decided to get the Bee Magnificent after sampling tons of juices and nut milks. The customer service is also on point! The owner is also very beautiful and had the most gorgeous dress lol! Need to come back ASAP and maybe try a juice cleanse. :)

This place is amazing. The juices are so fresh from them being cold compressed. They offer samples for anything you would like to try. All the employees have a great attitude and are more than happy to answer any questions. This is truly a quality spot.
Danielle had the best knowledge with their juices. My allergies were so bad and she recommended the Bee grateful with added cayenne and it's amazing!! I love this place
Not only are they serving beautiful juices but because it is %100 organic they are contributing to mankind and the love ! Full of wholesome sustenance; these pure juices make love to you. lol

These girls did it! I've had wit a bit of juice places in Vegas and nothing compares to The Juice Standard. Make sure to check them out as a believe they have 3 locations and you won't be disappointed with anything on their menu. Always my number one choice for juice.

My first time at juice standard and Stacy was so helpful she explained to us each juice and it effect, also allowed us to taste several Stacy is great and my experience was great look forward to going back

This probably my favorite place to get juice. If you want something good. You should try the Bee Cosmopolitan, so delicious. I do like how I can get my nutrients from fresh pressed juice. The two gentleman, I believe their names are Cody and Nate, that were working yesterday helped me find the right juice for me. They are very knowledgeable on what juice would be best for hydration and energy. While still being busy and constantly having things clean as they go, they helped out loads of people that come in. I came there last time and I think the tall guy is Cody, but he makes the best coffee. Thanks you two. What you hear about juicing is really good for you, and every time I go it is always awesome. You guys should also try their carrot muffins, so delicious.

i've been waiting for a juice store to open here and this one has everything you'd want. 

fresh,  cold-pressed, and(most importantly) delicious juices. 

The staff is very knowledgable and helpful with tastings and explanations of what each juice does. 

The nut milks are so good!  they'll make you believe you can survive a juice cleanse :P

Best coffee in Las Vegas!  
The staff are always friendly and wonderful.  
The juice blends are well thought out and delicious.  We are here at least a couple times a week.  Love this location
Love this place- great product and even better staff!  Will definitely be back for more.

I stopped by around 6:40 to check this place out. Greeted by warm smiles and lovely decor. Since it was my first time, the lady let me sample all of their drinks and explain what each drink does what. She was very kind, too bad I didn't get her name.

I was going to buy the 1 day cleanse ($60) but I didn't really enjoy 4/8 of their listings. I decided to just buy 5 full size drinks.

Bee on Point: very fresh!!
Bee Chill: my ideal of summer!
Bee Vibrant: really refreshing with a nice kick
Bee Positive: MY FAV 
Bee energized: definitely something I would drink daily (lemonade like)

I'm excited to come back here even though the prices are a bit expensive. but $1 off from bringing back the glass jars, hell yes!!

I absolutely love this place !!! The juices, nut milks and  coffee are amazing . I am addicted to The bee magnificent and e3live . The staff is so attentive and informative. This is exactly what Ive been searching for in Las Vegas

They have an amazing variety of cold pressed juices. They will walk you through every type as well as let you sample each and every option. You can buy a pre-organized juice cleanse that is tailored to provide maximum energy and efficacy. 

I have a nut allergy so I can't drink all of their juices but they use a separate machine for the nut milks so I never have to worry about cross contamination. If you juice at all you will love this place. And if you are thinking about starting, this is the perfect place to get your juice on.

The customer service here is fantastic. The location isn't convenient for me but that will not stop me from going back! 

The juices are delicious. Far better than Pressed Juicery & Blue Print Cleanse. Be Grateful is my favorite so far but I bought 3 others to try as well.
I love this place.. I come her almost daily on my lunch break.. Great product, great customer service, and a wealth of knowledge

Hip hip hooray three times!  Local! Organic! Renewable! The Juice Standard (TJS) offers a gift program. In addition to gift cards, you can purchase pressed juice as a gift. I was one lucky recipient of a 6 bottle gift. I was surprised at my office with juices to refresh, replenish, and rejuvenate me. Such a wonderful surprise had me smiling and keeping me up with my day.

TJS is local, locally owned, focused on organic and seasonal produce, and promotes sustainability with a recycling program for the glass bottles. And glass is better! Say no to chemicals from plastic leached into your foods, plastic, especially #1, #3, #6, and #7, has been found to leach potential carcinogens and other chemicals into the bottled liquid. Thank you TJS for a focus on health and wellness in Las Vegas.

There are a couple of juice places around this area but I decided to try this one. I was looking for a fresh made juice but this place only has bottled. They make smoothies as well, otherwise, all juices are bottled with a date of expiration about 2 days from purchase. Given that it is $9 per bottle, I would recommend a different juice bar. I didn't think this place had anything extra to offer.

I did a 3-day cleanse and the entire staff was super informative and helpful and gave me samples before I fully committed. Their juices are just so pure and fresh - I absolutely love it there. Marcela (one of the owners) was super friendly.  They've got a huge selection and really something for everyone's taste. This will definitely be my "go-to" from now on. At the end of the cleanse I lost 4lbs of just yucky, bloated, sodium-filled nastiness and I feel back to normal now. It has definitely reset my button and I'm back on track and into my usual workout routines which I have way more energy for now. Thanks everyone!

I am in love with all of their juices. Their easy to take down being that they are so smooth. My favorites are BeeGrateful, BeeRoyal and BeeChill. They all have great benefits and are enjoyable to drink because they taste delicious. I love how my skin glows days after drinking these cold pressed juices. BeeEffective is known to make your skin glow and although it does taste good (to me) you have to be open to having something more "green" tasting.

The very best juice on the planet! They seriously have the best juices ever! Along with many nutmilks, amazing shakes, dried snacks and one of the healthiest coffee drinks you can get! Make your life better get some today!

The juice standard is a great place to pick up cold pressed juice. They have just about every blend you could want. I do enjoy their nut milks as well. The staff is friendly and helpful, offering samples of the blend before you buy.

Came here on the weekend to try out something after working out. They seem to have really good reviews about the juices (obviously what they're known for)... well silly me got a smoothie. It was one of the berry ones. Not thick, very watery, and didn't have any taste to it. Maybe it wasn't one of the best options for me, but it sounded good. Hopefully I'll be in the area next time to try out some juices. But for now, I wouldn't come back unless someone invited me on over.
One of my favorite places to go for my juicing needs, amazing staff, very knowledgeable and friendly!

I drive all the way across town for these awesome nut milks! Sure I can juice at home but these milks are like dessert. Elle is super friendly and helpful and I certainly recommend the juice tasting. They want to make sure you are happy with the product. Pricey but it's nice to indulge every once and awhile. Can't wait for the new location opening on St. Rose.
Great customer service!!!  We went after a run and got to try the juices before deciding what to get!!  Will definitely come back :)
